name: The Manhattan Menace
description:
Welcome to The Manhattan Menace

This game was made over a 3 day period for the #26 Jame Gam.

A game about an extraterrestrial ogre that has sought refuge in Central Park, New York!

You play as this ogre as you fend off the angry people of New York City that are trying to evict you.

Earn coins to unlock perks and abilities to help you survive longer.

How long can you survive in the chaos of the New York residents?

Aim and click to shoot enemies

Press [Esc] to access the upgrade menu

Upgrade your health and shield, or unlock special card abilities!

PRESS [SPACE] TO PLAY!!!
